Body:
In addition to Western and Eastern Arabic numeral symbols is there any other numeral symbols in active use nowadays? There is 460 decimal (46 numeral set) and 224 non-decimal number in Unicode, which ones are in use? (You can use BabelPad to see the numeral Unicode characters)

Knowing the answer help developers in localization too.
Title: In use numeral systems

OwnerUser.AboutMe: A good Persian dictionary for you: [Vajje.com]: http://vajje.com
